name: The Forest Sage
description:
You need to grow trees and go further into the forest to meet the legendary Forest Sage.

This game was made for Kenney Jam 2022.

Controls:

  • Move: WADS, Arrow Keys or Numpad
  • Grow Trees: E or Enter
  • Restart: R
  • Skip Level: N
  • Exit to Main Menu: Esc

Assets:

  • 1-Bit Pack
  • Free Footsteps Sound Effects
  • butterfly - looped ambience sounds pack
  • Bard's Tales - Peaceful Harp Music Pack
